properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.api-key
properties.description: The API key for authentication with CyberArk Conjur

properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.auth-token
properties.description: Pre-authenticated token to use for CyberArk Conjur

properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.certificate-path
properties.description: Path to the SSL certificate for verification

properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.configuration
properties.description: Component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.cyberark.vault.CyberArkVaultConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.conjur-client
properties.description: Reference to a ConjurClient instance in the registry. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.cyberark.vault.client.ConjurClient type.

properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the cyberark-vault component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.password
properties.description: The password for authentication with CyberArk Conjur

properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.secret-id
properties.description: The secret ID to retrieve from CyberArk Conjur

properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.username
properties.description: The username for authentication with CyberArk Conjur

properties.name: camel.component.cyberark-vault.verify-ssl
properties.description: Whether to verify SSL certificates when connecting to CyberArk Conjur
